title: Generate Campaign Insight from Report
description: An analyst is reviewing a performance report and needs to provide an actionable insight beyond just stating the numbers.

tasks.description: Review a campaign report, noting that the overall click-through rate (CTR) has declined.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a negative trend in a key metric.

tasks.description: Dig deeper into the data, segmenting by device type.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a new query to break down performance by device.

tasks.description: Discover that the CTR decline is entirely due to poor performance on mobile devices.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pinpoints the root cause of the problem.

tasks.description: Provide the insight: 'The campaign's CTR is dropping due to mobile performance. We should review our mobile ad creative and landing page experience.'
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, actionable insight that suggests a next step.
